import React from 'react'; import TotalDisplay from './components/TotalDisplay'; import CalcButton from './components/CalcButton'; import { useReducer } from 'react'; import { initialState } from './reducers'; import reducer from './reducers'; import { ADD_ONE, applyNumber, APPLY_NUMBER } from './actions'; function App() { const [state , dispatch] = useReducer(reducer , initialState) return (
Reducer Challenge
Operation: {state.operation} Memory: {state.memory}
dispatch({type : ADD_ONE})} value={1} /> dispatch(applyNumber(2))} value={2} />
); } export default App;
